B

BATTERY_STATUS_FULL - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The battery is full.
BATTERY_STATUS_NONE - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
No battery.
BATTERY_STATUS_USB_PLUGGED - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The USB is plugged.
BluetoothReader - Class in com.acs.bluetooth
The BluetoothReader class represents ACS Bluetooth readers.
BluetoothReader() - Constructor for class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
Creates an instance of BluetoothReader.
BluetoothReader.OnAtrAvailableListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the ATR string is available.
BluetoothReader.OnAuthenticationCompleteListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the authentication is completed.
BluetoothReader.OnCardPowerOffCompleteListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the reader powers off the card.
BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusAvailableListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the card status is available.
BluetoothReader.OnCardStatusChangeListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the card status is changed.
BluetoothReader.OnDeviceInfoAvailableListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the device information is available.
BluetoothReader.OnEnableNotificationCompleteListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the reader get the result of enable notification.
BluetoothReader.OnEscapeResponseAvailableListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the escape response is available.
BluetoothReader.OnResponseApduAvailableListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the response APDU is available.
BluetoothReaderGattCallback - Class in com.acs.bluetooth
The BluetoothReaderGattCallback class is used to implement BluetoothGatt callback for ACS Bluetooth readers.
BluetoothReaderGattCallback() - Constructor for class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReaderGattCallback
Creates an instance of BluetoothReaderGattCallback.
BluetoothReaderGattCallback(BluetoothReaderManager) - Constructor for class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReaderGattCallback
Creates an instance of BluetoothReaderGattCallback.
BluetoothReaderGattCallback.OnConnectionStateChangeListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the connection state is changed.
BluetoothReaderManager - Class in com.acs.bluetooth
The BluetoothReaderManager class detects ACS Bluetooth readers.
BluetoothReaderManager() - Constructor for class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReaderManager
Creates an instance of BluetoothReaderManager.
BluetoothReaderManager.OnReaderDetectionListener - Interface in com.acs.bluetooth
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the reader is detected.
